item.title: update free-plan quota description
item.description: https://form-data.com - No-code forms backend. Spam filter, email notification and auto-respond, webhooks, zapier, redirects, AJAX or POST and more. Free plan offers unlimited forms, 20 submissions/month and additional 2000 submissions with Form-Data badge.
